alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River; Yukon Flats (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 5:42AM AKST until December 13 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Visibility as low as one half mile at times. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will be Tuesday evening into Wednesday morning. The highest snowfall totals will be along the Steese Highway from Eagle Summit to Circle.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River; Yukon Flats
